# Fair migration

## set up

```{r}
#| message:false

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

```

This file expects all scripts in `pipeline` have been run locally.

```{r}
#| error: true

ao_top_3 <- read_csv(here("pipeline/pipeline-data/analytical_ranking_top_3.csv"))

```


## recreate barplot

```{r}

# need to find a number to validate the image on


# pooking with a stick
ao_top_3 |>
  mutate(sdg_label = str_c(sdg_label, " (", sdg_id, ")")) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(
    aes(x = sdg_label, stat="identity", fill=ranking)
  ) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~region, scales = "free") +
  theme_minimal()

```
